headline: eBay (EBAY): Assessing Valuation After a 32% Year-to-Date Share Price Climb
summary: eBay (EBAY) has quietly pushed higher this year, with the stock up roughly 32% year to date and about 32% over the past year, outpacing many traditional retail and ecommerce peers. See our latest analysis for eBay. The latest move to a share price of $82.47 caps a strong run, with solid year to date share price gains and a powerful three year total shareholder return north of 100% suggesting momentum is still very much on eBay’s side. If eBay’s climb has you rethinking your portfolio, it...
